Title: Relates to suspending the granting of charters for proposed charter schools not acted upon prior to April 1, 2021
Summary: Relates to suspending the granting of charters for proposed charter schools not acted upon prior to April 1, 2021; provides that no further action shall be taken for charter schools where classes have not commenced prior to August 31, 2021.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to suspending the granting of charters for proposed charter schools not acted upon prior to April 1, 2021; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
